properties.Name: Village Brewery
properties.Favorites: Village Wit, Village Blacksmith, Village Squeeze
properties.Review: "15 bucks got like 2000 beers and popcorn. Do it. Now."

properties.Name: Minhas Micro Brewery - Calgary
properties.Review: "Friends don't let friends drink Minhas beer."

properties.Name: Banded Peak Brewing
properties.Review: "Forgot your growler? Fear not.. Banded Peak has 1L cans they call (domesticated) canimals. These things are a great way to bring two pints per can to your friends house or out hiking."

properties.Name: Wild Rose Brewery Ltd
properties.Review: "Their seasonal brews are always good. My favourite is the cherry porter."

properties.Name: The Dandy Brewing Company
properties.Favorites: Dandy in the Underworld, Wild Sour Ale
properties.Review: "Best, most authentic nano-brewery in the city. Best sour selection and constantly changing the taps with something new."

properties.Name: Cold Garden Beverage Company
properties.Review: "If dogs and beer are two of your favorite things, Cold Garden in Inglewood is your new favorite place"

properties.Name: Common Crown Brewing Co.
properties.Review: "What makes this brewery exciting is that they have taken classic styles and changed them just a touch which makes them stand out from the crowd in a pleasant way. "

properties.Name: Big Rock Brewery
properties.Review: "I was happy to take home a six-pack of Czech Style Pilsner and a wealth of new knowledge."

properties.Name: Zero Issue Brewing
properties.Review: "Employees were extra friendly and the Nemesis IPA is the jam. Glad I caught this place in the early days - it will be a big hit for sure!"

properties.Name: Citizen Brewing Company
properties.Review: "Excellent service, nothing but class acts running this funky place."

properties.Name: Boiling Oar Brewing Company
properties.Review: "Enjoyable high test IPA. A bit of sweetness with a syrupy quality, the head is bright white and dies down slowly. Best Boiling Oar brew"

properties.Name: High Line Brewing
properties.Review: "I know that being as out there as Cold Garden might not be necessary, but the environment they're offering seems lacking... It's a nice place for a pint with friends but it's a little lacklustre in comparison to the competition."

properties.Name: Last Best Brewing & Distilling
properties.Review: "Last Best is in my opinion the best brewery in Calgary, and they produce some absolutely top notch beers. Their IPA is my favourite personally."

properties.Name: Caravel Craft Brewery
properties.Favorites: Cold Brew Coffee Lager, Munich Dunkel
properties.Review: "Vlad, who is the brew master and owner of Caravel Craft Brewery, has fantastic brews of Hefeweizen, Pilsner, Irish Red Ale, a special coffee brew, and a Ginger beer. "

properties.Name: Railyard Brewing
properties.Review: "The IPA is one of the best I have had. They have a pool table, dart board and board games so it's an awesome place to hang out and have a few pints."

properties.Name: Tool Shed Brewing Company
properties.Review: "I've yet to come across a more passionate founder whose story of success inspires others than that of Graham Sherman's."

properties.Name: Annex Ale Project
properties.Review: "This place has a great community feel and many people were popping in and out on their bike to get growler fills. Captures the Alberta craft beer spirit. Just great!"
